title: ACCOUNTING
utme_requirements: Five credit passes at not more than two sittings in the Senior School Certificate Examination (SSCE) or its equivalent-- West African Senior School Certificate Examination (WASSCE), National Examination Council (NECO), National Technical Certificate (NTC) or General Certificate of Education (GCE O/L) in relevant subjects. The relevant subjects are English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects from the following: Chemistry, Physics, Further Mathematics, Statistics, Agricultural Science,  Biology, History and Geography.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other subject.

title: BIOCHEMISTRY

The relevant subjects are English Language, Mathematics, Biology and any other two subjects from the following: Chemistry, Physics, Further Mathematics, Statistics, Agricultural Science, Geography and Economics.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Biology and any other subject.
